In England, in the seven days to 11 January, there were 719,561 new confirmed cases (1,272.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 January, there were 1,101,607 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (382,046 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 January is 12,906,041 (22,822.3 cases per 100,000 population).
